DOC.brief_summary: It is well known that traffic accidents are one of the major reasons for death in childhood. Unfortunately scientific and statistical data usually comes from developed countries. In this study, the investigators will try to evaluate Turkish families' knowledge on Child Passenger Safety, observe how they carry their babies in the car and investigated the reasons behind the undesired behaviors.
DOC.brief_title: Level of Knowledge and Habitual Concepts of Turkish Parents on Child Passenger Safety
DOC.criteria: All families Families with premature or neurologically disabled babies.
